Text: Does this have the Behringer DDM4000 mapper and the CDJ2000 skin?
Ok so I downloaded the torrent and I am wondering on how to install the skins now. A write up would be nice.Thanks. Sorry about the dumb question.

For those of you wondering, I was lost to about installing the skins - look in your My Documents folder for VirtualDJ and inside there you should she a skins folder.

It took me a while to figure this out because I kept thinking there was a way to map the skin folder in the program.
